title: Gli orologi del diavolo
overview: Marco is a marine engineer who suddenly sees himself involved in a complex police operation: being infiltrated in a Spanish narco organization. Marco's life falls apart, as he will have to change his country, lie to his beloved ones and get apart from his family to spend his hardest time in a jail. What Marco does not know yet, is that choosing the right side is not always a good idea…The revenge has started.
